text:
@JoeBiden Grab a mask if you want my vote.  Black people dying from Coronavirus and racist guns while you sit in your basement cozy making Jokes.

We need the 29 year old Biden who was willing to fight.  If thats not you...bow out and we will wade in the water for 4 years finding a fighter
